languages.text: "Ваши глаза сияют рубинами на закатном небе, а кожа и волосы подобны свежему снегу — я никогда не видел чего-то прекраснее".

traits.locale_text: "Ваши глаза сияют рубинами на закатном небе, а кожа и волосы подобны свежему снегу — я никогда не видел чего-то прекраснее ".

languages.text: "Your eyes shine like rubies against a sunset sky, and your skin and hair are like fresh snow. Never before have I seen anything so beautiful."
languages.original_text: "Ваши глаза сияют рубинами на закатном небе, а кожа и волосы подобны свежему снегу — я никогда не видел чего-то прекраснее".

traits.locale_text: "Your eyes shine like rubies against a sunset sky, and your skin and hair are like fresh snow. Never before have I seen anything so beautiful."
"Your eyes shine like rubies against a sunset sky, and your skin and hair are like fresh snow. Never before have I seen anything so beautiful."
"Your eyes shine like rubies against a sunset sky, and your skin and hair are like fresh snow. Never before have I seen anything so beautiful."
"Your eyes shine like rubies against a sunset sky, and your skin and hair are like fresh snow. Never before have I seen anything so beautiful."
"Your eyes shine like rubies against a sunset sky, and your skin and hair are like fresh snow. Never before have I seen anything so beautiful."

languages.text: “你的眼睛就像炽烈的晚霞中闪耀的红宝石，你的皮肤与发丝像初落的新雪，洁白无垢。我从来没见过比这更美的画面。”
languages.original_text: "Your eyes shine like rubies against a sunset sky, and your skin and hair are like fresh snow. Never before have I seen anything so beautiful."

traits.locale_text: “你的眼睛就像炽烈的晚霞中闪耀的红宝石，你的皮肤与发丝像初落的新雪，洁白无垢。我从来没见过比这更美的画面。”

languages.text: "Eure Augen leuchten wie Rubine vor einem Sonnenuntergang, und Eure Haare und Eure Haut sind wie frischer Schnee. Ich habe noch nie zuvor etwas derart Schönes gesehen."
languages.original_text: "Your eyes shine like rubies against a sunset sky, and your skin and hair are like fresh snow. Never before have I seen anything so beautiful."

traits.locale_text: "Eure Augen leuchten wie Rubine vor einem Sonnenuntergang, und Eure Haare und Eure Haut sind wie frischer Schnee. Ich habe noch nie zuvor etwas derart Schönes gesehen."

languages.text: « Vos yeux brillent comme des rubis face au soleil couchant, et votre peau et vos cheveux sont comme la neige fraîche. Je n'avais jamais rien vu d'aussi beau. »
languages.original_text: "Your eyes shine like rubies against a sunset sky, and your skin and hair are like fresh snow. Never before have I seen anything so beautiful."

traits.locale_text: « Vos yeux brillent comme des rubis face au soleil couchant, et votre peau et vos cheveux sont comme la neige fraîche. Je n'avais jamais rien vu d'aussi beau. »

languages.text: «Sus ojos, brillantes como rubíes, no tienen nada que envidiarle al cielo al atardecer. Su piel y su cabello se asemejan a la blanca nieve recién posada en una flor. Nunca había visto nada tan hermoso».
languages.original_text: "Your eyes shine like rubies against a sunset sky, and your skin and hair are like fresh snow. Never before have I seen anything so beautiful."

traits.locale_text: «Sus ojos, brillantes como rubíes, no tienen nada que envidiarle al cielo al atardecer. Su piel y su cabello se asemejan a la blanca nieve recién posada en una flor. Nunca había visto nada tan hermoso».

languages.text: 「あなたの瞳は夕暮れの空に対してルビーのように輝いている。あなたの肌と髪は、まるで新雪のようだ。これほど美しいものを、私は今まで見たことがない」
languages.original_text: "Your eyes shine like rubies against a sunset sky, and your skin and hair are like fresh snow. Never before have I seen anything so beautiful."

traits.locale_text: 「あなたの瞳は夕暮れの空に対してルビーのように輝いている。あなたの肌と髪は、まるで新雪のようだ。これほど美しいものを、私は今まで見たことがない」

languages.text: "Benim Cassia'mın gözleri, gün batımındaki yakutlar gibidir. Saçları, teni... Taze düşmüş kar gibidir. Hiçbir şey onun güzelliğiyle boy ölçüşemez."
languages.original_text: "Your eyes shine like rubies against a sunset sky, and your skin and hair are like fresh snow. Never before have I seen anything so beautiful."
